[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Buffalo_WZR-HP-G300NH On the DD-WRT wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = wzr-hp-g300nh build 13525 20091228 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Buffalo_WZR-HP-G300NH Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-g300h |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
